snippet.title: Eternal Mist demo is available on #Steam now!
snippet.description:
📜 Eternal Mist is a real-time tactical game with some RPG elements. Explore a post-apocalyptic fantasy world in which a deadly mist has engulfed almost the entire land, and the survivors huddle in small mountainous areas. Protect these lands from the horrors hiding in the mist!

So, if you're ready to exercise your strategic prowess and try yourself in intense real-time tactics, take a look at the Eternal Mist demo!
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2102300/Eternal_Mist/

👇 Follow us 👇

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2102300/Eternal_Mist/
Itch.io: https://rionix.itch.io/eternal-mist
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/RionixGames/
X: https://x.com/rionixgames

---

Music "Cinematic Oriental Trailer" by Gregor Quendel
https://opengameart.org/content/free-cinematic-trailer-music

Music "Betrayed" by Alexandr Zhelanov
https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

#realtime #tactics #strategy #game #demo #unrealengine #pixelart
